definition: contemptuously distrustful of human nature and motives
having little or no interest or concern : indifferent
capable of being understood in two or more possible senses or ways
a plan of action adopted by an individual or social group
extremely bad reputation, public reproach, or strong condemnation as the result of a shameful, criminal, or outrageous act
the use of words to convey a meaning that is the opposite of its literal meaning
coming into view or notice; issuing.
a statement or proposition that seems self-contradictory or absurd but in reality expresses a possible truth.
